thread.title: San Antonio man mistakenly shoots, kills wife, police say
thread.title_full: San Antonio man mistakenly shoots, kills wife, police say | Albuquerque Journal News

author: Associated Press
title: San Antonio man mistakenly shoots, kills wife, police say
text:
SAN ANTONIO — Investigators say a man shot and killed his wife inside the couple’s San Antonio home after apparently mistaking her for an intruder.
The San Antonio Express News reports ( http://bit.ly/1LnK1EE) that the man told police he heard noises coming from in front of his house on the city’s far north side after 4 a.m. Saturday. He also reported seeing a flash of light.
Believing someone was trying to break into the home, the man got a gun and fired a single shot, killing his 48-year-old wife.
Neither the shooter nor victim were immediately identified. The woman had a gunshot wound to her upper body and was pronounced dead at the scene.
Detectives interviewed her husband but he wasn’t immediately charged, pending further investigation.
___
Information from: San Antonio Express-News, http://www.mysanantonio.com
